rows.label: qev080402_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ugh, some career opportunity this turned out to be.
She said I'd be the boss, but all I do is haggle for
weapons and dig up info on BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0002
rows.name:
If I'd known I'd be the queen of busywork,
I'd have thought twice about who I tagged along with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0003
rows.name:
...Hmm? Oh, I'm done wheeling and dealing.
If you still need me for something, I'm free now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_JNK0010
rows.name: Offer

rows.label: qev080402_SEL0011
rows.name: Lend an ear if Avi has something on her mind.

rows.label: qev080402_JNK0020
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev080402_SEL0021
rows.name: Accuse Avi of secretly being a Definian.

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0004
rows.name:
Aw, that's so nice! But yeah, it's just that I recently got
scouted to be the head of a new organization.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0005
rows.name:
I was all excited to be the boss, but when I showed up,
I was the only person working there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0006
rows.name:
At the end of the day, I'm basically just an errand girl
for Moth... Um, for the CEO.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0007
rows.name: ...Hmm? Is the CEO's name Fortun?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0008
rows.name: Well yeah, but... HEY! H-how did you...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0009
rows.name: Wait! Are you [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0010
rows.name: Wh-what are you talking about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0011
rows.name:
...Someone saw me transform?! S-says who?
Where are you digging this garbage up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0012
rows.name: Oh, WAIT! I bet you're [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0013
rows.name: Mother told me to watch out for you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0014
rows.name:
Oof, but I'm deep in hostile territory here...
Okay, keep it together, Lyvia. Think![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0015
rows.name: Rrrgh! There's no other choice but the nuclear option![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0016
rows.name:
Run awaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay!
...Oh, but I still need you to deliver those ASAP, Fritz.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hey, give me a break here! I'm buying in bulk!
The least you could do is cut me a deal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'm forking over what little money I've got.
Can't you meet me halfway on this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0019
rows.name: Pleeease?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0020
rows.name:
...Um, sorry, but I'm kind of in the middle of an
important deal here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080402_MSG0021
rows.name: If you need me, you'll just have to wait a minute.[ST:wait ]
